title: Kushi Institute
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Buffet, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Macrobiotic School with  store and also offers buffet-style breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Mostly vegan except for fish twice a week. Call for daily menu for for varying store hours. Store sells organic, vegan and natural foods, from dried Japanese speciality foods to cooking oils, organic and natural grain sweeteners, pickles and condiments, as well cookware, eco friendly cleaning and laundry products, and more.
